mojo.description: Goal which touches a timestamp file.

parameter.name: XaddSerialVersionUID
parameter.description: Causes the compiler to calculate and add the SerialVersionUID field to any type implementing Serializable that is affected by an aspect. The field is calculated based on the class before weaving has taken place.

parameter.name: XhasMember
parameter.description:
Enables the compiler to support hasmethod(method_pattern) and hasfield(field_pattern) type patterns, but only within declare statements.
It's experimental and undocumented because it may change, and because it doesn't yet take into account ITDs.

parameter.name: Xlint
parameter.description: Set default level for messages about potential programming mistakes in crosscutting code. {level} may be ignore, warning, or error. This overrides entries in org/aspectj/weaver/XlintDefault.properties from aspectjtools.jar.

parameter.name: XnoInline
parameter.description: (Experimental) do not inline around advice

parameter.name: Xreweavable
parameter.description: (Experimental) runs weaver in reweavable mode which causes it to create woven classes that can be rewoven, subject to the restriction that on attempting a reweave all the types that advised the woven type must be accessible.

parameter.name: XserializableAspects
parameter.description: (Experimental) Normally it is an error to declare aspects Serializable. This option removes that restriction.

parameter.name: ajdtBuildDefFile
parameter.description: Where to find the ajdt build definition file. If set this will override the use of project sourcedirs.

parameter.name: argumentFileName
parameter.description: The filename to store build configuration in. This file will be placed in the project build output directory, and will contain all the arguments passed to the compiler in the last run, and also all the filenames included in the build. Aspects as well as java files.

parameter.name: aspectDirectory
parameter.description: The source directory for the aspects

parameter.name: basedir
parameter.description: The basedir of the project.

parameter.name: bootclasspath
parameter.description: Override location of VM's bootclasspath for purposes of evaluating types when compiling. Path is a single argument containing a list of paths to zip files or directories, delimited by the platform-specific path delimiter.

parameter.name: complianceLevel
parameter.description: Specify compiler compliance setting (1.3 to 1.6) default is 1.4

parameter.name: deprecation
parameter.description: Toggle warningmessages on deprecations

parameter.name: emacssym
parameter.description: Generate .ajesym symbol files for emacs support

parameter.name: encoding
parameter.description: Specify default source encoding format.

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: List of ant-style patterns used to specify the aspects that should be excluded when compiling. When none specified all .java and .aj files in the project source directories, or directories spesified by the ajdtDefFile property are included.

parameter.name: forceAjcCompile
parameter.description: Forces re-compilation, regardless of whether the compiler arguments or the sources have changed.

parameter.name: includes
parameter.description: List of ant-style patterns used to specify the aspects that should be included when compiling. When none specified all .java and .aj files in the project source directories, or directories spesified by the ajdtDefFile property are included.

parameter.name: noImportError
parameter.description: Emit no errors for unresolved imports;

parameter.name: outxml
parameter.description: Generate aop.xml file for load-time weaving with default name.(/META-INF/aop.xml)

parameter.name: outxmlfile
parameter.description: Generate aop.xml file for load-time weaving with custom name.

parameter.name: preserveAllLocals
parameter.description: Preserve all local variables during code generation (to facilitate debugging).

parameter.name: proceedOnError
parameter.description: Keep compiling after error, dumping class files with problem methods

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The maven project.

parameter.name: referenceInfo
parameter.description: Compute reference information.

parameter.name: repeat
parameter.description: Repeat compilation process N times (typically to do performance analysis).

parameter.name: showWeaveInfo
parameter.description: Emit messages about weaving

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: Toggle assertions (1.3, 1.4, or 1.6 - default is 1.4). When using -source 1.3, an assert() statement valid under Java 1.4 will result in a compiler error. When using -source 1.4, treat assert as a keyword and implement assertions according to the 1.4 language spec. When using -source 1.5 or higher, Java 5 language features are permitted.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: Specify classfile target setting (1.1 to 1.6) default is 1.2

parameter.name: testAspectDirectory
parameter.description: The source directory for the test aspects

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: Emit messages about accessed/processed compilation units

parameter.name: warn
parameter.description: Emit warnings for any instances of the comma-delimited list of questionable code (eg 'unusedLocals,deprecation'): see http://www.eclipse.org/aspectj/doc/released/devguide/ajc-ref.html#ajc for available settings

mojo.description:
Display help information on smok.
Call 
  mvn smok:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name>
to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.
